    I Know a Secret

      2. I know a secret
      3. the creature said
      4. He sat there on the cobblestones
      5. in the darkness, just out of sight
      6. of the yellow sodium light
      2. We sat there for a while
      3. Me on the bench, him by the sea
      4. The wind not much
      5. by the waterfront
      2. The creature spoke again
      2. a few years back,
      3. I was sitting not far from here
      4. in the darkness, just out of sight
      5. a man raped a girl under cover of the night
      2. I know a secret,
      3. for I see very well,
      4. even under — the night.
      5. These eyes catch many things
      6. I will never tell.
      2. The truth came out
      3. decades later at the trial
      4. Your courts — are not like ours
      5. We have eyes — which catch
      6. The beating of the heart
      7. Whispers — inside the throat
      2. I saw an old man ill and dying
      3. too rich and sick for jail
      4. When he was coughing sputum up
      5. I was sitting there
      6. I know a secret
      7. and I will never tell
